revised_title: Discovery and Preliminary Analysis of a New Star in Auriga
tldr: The author, J. Norman Lockyer, reports the discovery of a new star in the constellation Auriga and shares preliminary findings from its spectroscopic analysis. The star's spectrum contains hydrogen, calcium, and hydrocarbon lines, similar to those observed in various types of Cygnus stars. The author also discusses the energy absorbed by friction in the bores of rifled guns.
